1:
Many years  ago,
the Lizard and the Frog were friends. 
One day they decided
to look for girlfriends
in the city.
2:
The Frog was jealous
of the Lizard's shining
and brilliant skin.
3:
He said, "What did you do to look so beautiful?
Look at me, I am so ugly. What can I do about my skin?"
4:
The Lizard said,
"Listen! Put some water
in a pot and put it
on the fire. 
Next you..."
5:
But the Frog said,
"I know already, I know. 
Shut up, my friend."
And he left.
6:
So he arrived home
and put some water
in a pot.
7:
When the water began
to boil, he threw himself into it.
8:
His skin was burnt
and his tail came off!
9:
And instead of being brilliant and beautiful
like the Lizard,
he was even more ugly!
